header.stack: Java • Selenide • Appium • Web • API • Mobile

about.text: QA engineer with experience in manual and automated testing of web and mobile applications. Automation in Java: UI, API, and mobile tests using JUnit 5, Selenide, Appium, and REST Assured. Familiar with Allure, CI pipelines, and Git.

todoist.title: Multi-Layer Test Automation Framework for Todoist app
todoist.description: Enterprise-grade multi-layer test automation framework covering the same product across API, Web UI, and Android platforms. Designed as a multi-module Gradle project with unified reporting, CI integration, and environment-agnostic execution model.

intro: • No ads, no tracking, no analytics

allureTemplates.description: Custom FreeMarker templates for improved Request/Response rendering in Allure Report
